subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Todd, playing as a young mother, won four Grand Slam tennis tournaments in 1947 and 1948 but lost the chance for another in 1948 when she took a stand.
snippet: Todd, playing as a young mother, won four Grand Slam tennis tournaments in 1947 and 1948 but lost the chance for another in 1948 when she took a stand.
